title: Ok riot it might be time to give up on league
body: I just had a game where from minute 1 I got flames by my team simply because I had a keystone that was different then what they thought was acceptable. They then proceeded to int my game because and I quote “you don’t deserve to win with that keystone and riot won’t punish us anyway”. Riot if these are the type of people you allow to play your game them it might be time to call it quits and make a new game.

Tell your friends about the asshole you met in League, brush it off, and enjoy yourself anyway.

I'm just perplexed by this post. Like, they don't "permit" players to int and insult you over masteries. Should they be held accountable for their actions if that were the case? Sure. But their policies aren't set up to favor situations where others insult you or int at will. If they told you they weren't going to be punished, that's just another attempt to troll/harass you. Ignore them, and just play the game.
